events.text: This is it, pal! The last dance!

[color=#08ff00]Princess Coldheart[/color] has returned as an Archdemon prone to dancing fits!
And I never saw this plot twist coming...
She is going to DANCE over [color=#01d691]Styrofoam Grove[/color] until it's reduced to ash!

Relax! The kid is fine.
This isn't some fake-out where the kid is lost in some other place.
You'll find Niki in the big barn down below in the [color=#01d691]Grove[/color].
He wanted to get a head start!

Simply? You gotta annoy an Archdemon to make them go away.
Right, Maldoror?

Right! Now this is goodbye for now...
Mortals can't become full-fledged Reapers. You might be sick if you can see and visit the [color=#ff0000]Vale of the Dead[/color].
I can't thank you enough for helping me out of my [color=#ff0000]Urn[/color]!
Maybe we'll meet again one day, HAHAHAHA! The [color=#ff0000]Vale of the Dead[/color] is a big place.
Anyway go see [color=#00e529]Niki[/color] in the big barn down below in the [color=#01d691]Grove[/color].
[color=#00e529]Niki[/color] tells us that he's an expert in being annoying. Best of luck!
